Package org.agreement_technologies.service.map_landmarks

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GlobalIdInfo
    GlobalIdInfo class allows to define global identifiers for fluents, common to all agents in the task.
    LandmarksImp
    LandmarksImp is the main class to calculate and work with landmarks.
    LGNode
    LGNode class implements a node in the landmarks graph (LG).
    LMAction
    LMAction class implements actions in the landmarks graph.
    LMLiteral
    LMLiteral class implements a fluent, i.e.
    LMLiteralInfo
    LMLiteralInfo class allows to exchange information about landmark fluents between agents.
    LMOrdering
    LMOrdering class implements orderings between landmark nodes in the landmarks graph (LG).
    MALandmarkGraph
    MALandmarkGraph is the multi-agent landmark graph (LG) implementation.
    MessageContentGlobalId
    MessageContentGlobalId class implements a message used to calculate global identifiers for the landmarks.
    MessageContentLandmarkGraph
    MessageContentLandmarkGraph class implements a message used to exchange data from the landmarks graph.
    MessageContentLandmarkSharing
    MessageContentLandmarkSharing class implements a message used to transmit single landmarks to agents that are not in the label of the associated literal.
    MessageContentPostProcessing
    MessageContentLandmarkSharing class implements a message used to transmit orderings transmitted during the landmark graph postprocessing.
    MessageContentRPG
    MessageContentRPG class implements a message used to transmit data about the level in the RPG of a fluent.
    RPG
    RPG class represents the disRPG (distributed relaxed planning graph) of the planning agent.
    RPGMessageContent
    RPGMessageContent class implements a message used to transmit data about the levels in the RPG of several fluents.
    SALandmarkGraph
    SALandmarkGraph is the single-agent landmark graph (LG) implementation.
    uSet
    uSet class implements a disjuctive set of fluents inside a landmark node.
